Hero.title: Fighting for All Animals
Hero.paragraph: We rescue, heal, and protect abandoned, injured, and neglected animals, giving them safety, love, and the chance to live freely. Every life matters, and every animal deserves a place to call home.

Work.title: Our Work
Work.p1: Animal Shepherd is a non-profit, no-kill organization founded on the belief that every life is precious. We provide a permanent no-cage sanctuary for animals living with challenges that leave them without other options.
Work.p2: From intensive clinical rehabilitation to the restoration of over 80 hectares of local ecosystems, our work ensures that every creature is valued through professional sanctuary care and environmental stewardship.

Residents.title: Meet Our Animals
Residents.description: Each animal at our sanctuary has a story. Some are healing, some are thriving, and all are loved.

CareTips.title: Care Tips
CareTips.description: Practical guidance to help you build trust and wellbeing with your pets.

1.heading: Play together every day
1.title: Tip #1
1.body: Playing with your pet indoors and outdoors builds trust, confidence, and a stronger bond.

2.heading: Adopt together
2.title: Tip #2
2.body: Animals thrive with companionship. If you are able, adopting two can improve their wellbeing.

3.heading: Choose healthy nutrition
3.title: Tip #3
3.body: Providing healthy, plant based options can support your pet health and long term vitality.

4.heading: Protect them from heat
4.title: Tip #4
4.body: Avoid walks during extreme heat and take steps to protect your pet health and comfort.

5.heading: Consider adopting a cat
5.title: Tip #5
5.body: Cats are loving, playful, and calming companions. Opening your home to one can change lives.

6.heading: Respect their freedom
6.title: Tip #6
6.body: Pets deserve space and dignity. Avoid keeping them confined and allow them to live freely.

7.heading: Give your time freely
7.title: Tip #7
7.body: Sharing your time and care supports meaningful causes and helps create a kinder world.

8.heading: Schedule regular checkups
8.title: Tip #8
8.body: Regular veterinary visits help detect issues early and ensure your pet lives a healthy life.

9.heading: Bathe them at home
9.title: Tip #9
9.body: Bathing your pet at home can reduce stress and strengthen the bond you share together.

10.heading: Support animal rescues
10.title: Tip #10
10.body: Donations help shelters provide food, medical care, and safe spaces for rescued animals.

11.heading: Enjoy time together
11.title: Tip #11
11.body: Spend quality time with your pet through daily walks and shared outdoor experiences.

Hero.title: Our Mission
Hero.paragraph: Fighting for the abandoned, neglected, and injured. We believe every life is precious and deserves a chance to thrive.

WhoWeAre.title: Who We Are
WhoWeAre.description: Animal Shepherd is a non-profit, no-kill animal rescue organization committed to animals living with challenges that would otherwise leave them without a chance. From rescue to rehabilitation, we provide a no-cage sanctuary where they can live safely and free from harm.

Impact.title: Our Impact & Responsibility
Impact.p1: Each year, we save the lives of more than 200 homeless animals and provide daily care for approximately 60 dogs, 40 cats, and additional farm residents. Every life is treated with dignity, patience, and long-term commitment.
Impact.p2: Beyond rescue, we are responsible for investigating cases of neglect and abuse. Our work extends to managing feral populations and providing alternatives for animals facing euthanasia, focusing on prevention and long-term education.

Pillars.title: Our Pillars of Care
Pillars.description: Our work is structured across three strategic areas to ensure a comprehensive approach to animal welfare and community sustainability.

rescue.title: Rescue & Clinical
rescue.item4: Hospice care and specialized medical support

wellness.title: Sanctuary & Wellness
wellness.item2: Pet hotel, eco camping, and lodging

Sanctuary.title: Our Sanctuary
Sanctuary.p1: What began as a mission to help cats, dogs, and farm animals has grown into a multifaceted sanctuary. Today, Animal Shepherd operates a no-cage shelter, pet-assisted therapy center, and eco-friendly retreat. Our facilities consist of three main buildings and smaller structures designed for comfort, healing, and fresh-air access.
Sanctuary.quote: Visitors often describe our space as a place of calm. It is a refuge where compassion, care, and respect for life are felt immediately upon arrival.

Conservation.title: A Legacy of Conservation
Conservation.description: Beyond our sanctuary walls, we are dedicated to the protection of the ecosystems that sustain all life. Our commitment to the planet is as deep as our commitment to its animals. We manage an ecological reserve where biodiversity is protected and the natural landscape is allowed to flourish.

Restoration.title: Restoring Ecosystems
Restoration.p1: Since 2015, we have been actively restoring over 80 hectares of local ecosystems. Through strategic reforestation, we have planted approximately 5,000 trees, creating a carbon-sequestering landscape that serves as a permanent refuge for both rescued and wild species.
Restoration.p2: Our approach combines permaculture with environmental management to ensure a sustainable future.
Restoration.quote: We promote a deep respect for life and the world we share, fostering an ethic of coexistence and shared responsibility.

Dedication.title: Dedication
Dedication.p1: This project is dedicated to the memory of Cioli, 'Savior of 100 lives.' On the shores of Santander, forged by the freezing waters of the Bay of Biscay, a young kid born in The Netherlands named Ryan learned from this man that duty is non-negotiable and that life is defended in silence.
Dedication.p2: That boy was his best disciple. Today, under the Mexican sky, that same will has saved over 1,000 lives.
Dedication.closing: Thank you Cioli. The watch continues.

Hero.title: Join Our Sanctuary Team
Hero.paragraph: Animal Shepherd operates as one of the largest independent farm sanctuaries in Mexico. Together, we can change the lives of those who have no voice.

Philosophy.title: Our No-Kill Philosophy
Philosophy.description: We believe that every life is precious and that every animal deserves a chance to be safe, healthy, and loved. We never euthanize an animal in our care simply because they are old, require expensive medical care, or because of insufficient space in our facilities. Every resident deserves safety, health, and love.

Volunteer.title: Volunteer
Volunteer.description: We are an all-volunteer non-profit that receives no state or federal funding. In our first 10 years, we have rescued and fostered over 1,000 animals. Join our sanctuary team and help us provide the hands-on care our residents deserve.
Volunteer.programDescription: We hold agreements with universities and corporations for social projects and professional internships. Gain field experience and direct connection with nature. Volunteer at our sanctuary. Help rescued animals through walking, bathing, playing, and feeding them. Register and participate!

Adopt.title: Adopt
Adopt.description: Our adoption process focuses on the long-term well-being of our residents. View our gallery of past and present family members to see the lives protected by our community. We work closely with you to ensure a responsible match for your lifestyle.
Adopt.responsibleDescription: Since 2023, we have teamed up with the Pedigree Adoptme program by MARS, becoming one of the shelters with the highest adoption rates in Mexico. Our process focuses on the 'ideal match,' applying a rigorous protocol to ensure every animal finds the right home, regardless of color, size, breed, or appearance.
Adopt.quote: We specialize in those who need it most: seniors, mixed breeds, pitbulls, and the sick. Don’t shop for a breed, adopt a soul in need. Adopt with your ❤️

Hero.title: Every Life is Precious
Hero.paragraph: Animal Shepherd relies on the support of animal-loving friends in our community. Your contribution directly funds the safety and care of every resident.

HeroAction.title: Make a Transformation Possible
HeroAction.description: Choose between a one-time gift or become a Sustaining Supporter with a recurring monthly donation to ensure long-term stability for our rescues. Every dollar given goes directly to the animals, providing them with the medical care, food, and shelter they deserve.

Impact.title: How Your Support Is Used
Impact.p1: All funds used to feed and provide veterinary care for the animals come through our own personal savings, the earnings of our public services, and private donations. With a strict no-kill philosophy, every resident at Animal Shepherd is cared for until a permanent home is found.
Impact.p2: While the sanctuary is not open to the general public, founders, donors, and regular supporters are invited to visit once a month by appointment between 09:00 am and 06:00 pm.

footer.note: Please include your name as a reference so we may properly acknowledge your gift.
footer.description: Our account is enabled to receive international donations and we are one of the few organizations equipped with a POS (Point of Sale) terminal to conveniently receive gifts and collect adoption fees.
